DOC.brief_summary: To compare the tolerance and early bone status of healthy, term infants fed formulas during the first three months of life.
DOC.brief_title: Tolerance and Development of Healthy, Term Infants
DOC.criteria: Healthy term infants; Age 08 days of age; Exclusively formula fed; No use of vitamin/mineral supplements. Maternal, fetal or perinatal medical history thought to have potential for negative effects on tolerance, growth or development.
